Trocadero Arena

Trocadero Arena is located on the Rio Real Beach (Marbella), we are already talking about a restaurant on the sea, without losing the essence of what a beach bar is. Decorated by Lorenzo Queipo de Llano, he has been part of countless fashion, beauty and gastronomy publishers and has been the protagonist of television programs. A magical space open every day of the year for lunch and dinner.

The root of our culinary offer is based on a product kitchen with a clear Mediterranean essence, but this case is enhanced with an important Asian influence. To the typical rice, fish and meat we add a specialized offer of Japanese food ideal to enjoy by the sea.

Location: Marbella beach

Dining room capaciy: 170pax

Price Level: Medium-high

Style:International food

Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: Yes
